oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1948-04-02 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on April 2, 1948 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Perry Ward (master of ceremonies), Mac Fuller [phonetic] (writer), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Thomas Family Trio; Lem Hawkins; Cowboy Jess
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:13) Opening theme and statements / (1:30) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Sourwood Mountain" / (2:57) Perry Ward talks / (3:38) The Thomas Family Trio performs "Maple On The Hill" / (6:25) Perry Ward introduces the next song / (6:50) Lem Hawkins performs "Down On The Farm" / (9:28) Cowboy Jess performs "Brown Eyed Lee" / (11:40) Perry Ward talks / (12:20) [Unidentified] performs "Almost Persuaded" / (13:44) Closing statements and theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Ward, Perry, 1914-1989;
